'Are you sure about the object date?'
[Comment by cda user Günter König, Schortens, 31 Jan. 2012]

pageContext.description:
Double portrait of Elector Johann Friedrich I (1503-1554) and his half-brother Johann Ernst (1521-1553) as half length against a blue background.
[cda 2015]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 29.2 bis 29.6 x 48.4 bis 48.8 x 1.2 cm
[Cat. Coburg 2018, 157]
pageContext.inscription:
- top left:
'AETATIS SVAE LII 1554'/ floral ornament
- top right:
'AETATIS SVAE XXXII 1553' /floral ornament
[Cat. Coburg 2018, 157]

involvedPersons.suffix: Copy after Lucas Cranach the Elder
